quest.name: All the Little Angels
journal: Isse is beside himself with emotion.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Right. Everyone ready?

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: I...I can manage on my own.

dialogue.name: GOSETSU
dialogue.text: 'Tis naught that will not heal with time.

dialogue.name: ISSE
dialogue.text: Can you believe it? We faced the crown prince himself and lived to tell the tale!

dialogue.name: ISSE
dialogue.text: You've no idea what this means for us. Everyone's talking about getting more weapons and armor and...and...

dialogue.name: ISSE
dialogue.text: And we're not going to stop until we've taken back our homeland!

dialogue.name: ISSE
dialogue.text: Ah, right. Getting a bit ahead of ourselves, aren't we? We've got wounded to tend to first. We should get back to the village!

dialogue.name: ISSE
dialogue.text: How are you feeling? After fighting that demon, I can only imagine...

dialogue.name: ISSE
dialogue.text: ...I suppose I ought to apologize to you. For...you know...

dialogue.name: ISSE
dialogue.text: Anyway, uh... Thank you. For not giving up on us. The shinobi too.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: In the meantime, how shall I occupy myself...

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: I will be traveling to the Azim Steppe, Forename.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: I found Lord Hien once before, and I am confident I can do so again. Moreover, it was to me whom he put the question of Doma's resolve. I feel it my duty to deliver to him our people's reply.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: My injuries are of no moment. You need not fear for me.

dialogue.name: GOSETSU
dialogue.text: Our countrymen's deeds speak for themselves. Lord Hien cannot deny the truth of their hearts.

dialogue.name: GOSETSU
dialogue.text: Too long has it been since I looked on his face. It would be of great comfort to see him again─and no small comfort if you were to join us in the search, I should add!

dialogue.name: GOSETSU
dialogue.text: I will wait no longer to greet my young lord and master! Nay, I should be glad to accompany Yugiri and bring him back home!

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: I wonder what kind of man Hien is. From what I heard, he's about the same age as me. And then there's Fordola, who isn't a whole lot younger than us both...

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: Like her, he was born and raised in an imperial province. This is all he's ever known. But unlike her, he chose to do something about it...

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: I want to meet him. I want to know why. Maybe, if I understand that, it'll help me to understand a lot of other things...

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: I don't think I could stand waiting around for them to get back. I want to go too.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: The beloved king returning to urge his countrymen to rise up in rebellion. Not a story you'd ever hear in Sharlayan or Ul'dah, is it?

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Not in those words, perhaps, but no land's people is so cynical to be wholly immune to inspiration. Singular individuals have the power to move hearts and minds no matter where they go.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Mmmhm. Doubtless you speak from personal experience.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: As much as this Lord Hien intrigues us, Forename, there are vital tasks to be attended to here─preparations for the inevitable assault on Doma Castle, for one.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: There is also the matter of coordinating our efforts with the Confederacy and our comrades in Kugane, dealing with this troublesome aetheryte─I could go on, but you understand.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: As I said before, we've a million things to do here. Much as Alphinaud and I would love to join the search, we cannot. Right, Brother?

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: ...Aye, so it goes. We all have our responsibilities.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: We shall depart for the Azim Steppe at once.

dialogue.name: GOSETSU
dialogue.text: You will be joining us, Forename?

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: For our part, we shall do what we can to aid the Doman Liberation Front in your absence.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: We will refrain from conducting any large-scale operations in your absence, and instead devote our energies to bolstering our ranks and training our new recruits. When you return, we will be ready for war.

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: If anything happens, if you need us to come back sooner, you'd better contact us. “Noble sacrifices” are a last resort, remember?

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: Follow me, my friends. We have many malms to travel before we reach Reunion.

dialogue.name: ISSE
dialogue.text: Wait! Don't leave yet!

dialogue.name: ISSE
dialogue.text: Here, take these for the road. It's simple fare, but it's the least we can do for you, after what you did for us.

dialogue.name: ISSE
dialogue.text: ...It may be stupid and naive of me to say this, but I will.

dialogue.name: ISSE
dialogue.text: When you come back, we'll finish what we started. We'll beat the imperials and we'll win our freedom! So...don't keep us waiting too long!
